verses.verse: וְדָוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid So when David זָקֵ֖ן <S%H2204><s%> za-Ken was old וְשָׂבַ֣ע <S%H7646><s%> ve-sa-Va' and full יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim; of days וַיַּמְלֵ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yam-Lech king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh he made Solomon בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. over Israel

וַיֶּאֱסֹף֙ <S%H622><s%> vai-ye-'e-Sof And he gathered together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> ve-hak-ko-ha-Nim with the priests וְהַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim. and the Levites

וַיִּסָּֽפְרוּ֙ <S%H5608><s%> vai-yis-sa-fe-Ru were numbered הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, Now the Levites מִבֶּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben from the age שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim of thirty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma-'e-lah; and upward וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become מִסְפָּרָ֤ם <S%H4557><s%> mis-pa-Ram and their number לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָם֙ <S%H1538><s%> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam by their polls לִגְבָרִ֔ים <S%H1397><s%> lig-va-Rim, man by man שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim was thirty וּשְׁמוֹנָ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah and eight אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand

מֵאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> me-'El-leh, Of which לְנַצֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H5329><s%> le-natz-Tze-ach [were] to set forward עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and מְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet the work בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and four אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef; thousand וְשֹׁטְרִ֥ים <S%H7860><s%> ve-sho-te-Rim [were] officers וְשֹׁפְטִ֖ים <S%H8199><s%> ve-sho-fe-Tim and judges שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> She-shet and six אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim. thousand

וְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba-'at Moreover four אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand שֹׁעֲרִ֑ים <S%H7778><s%> sho-'a-Rim; [were] porters וְאַרְבַּ֤עַת <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba-'at and four אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand מְהַֽלְלִ֣ים <S%H1984><s%> me-hal-Lim praised לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD בַּכֵּלִ֕ים <S%H3627><s%> bak-ke-Lim with the instruments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti which I made לְהַלֵּֽל׃ <S%H1984><s%> le-hal-Lel. [said David] to praise

וַיֶּֽחָלְקֵ֥ם <S%H2505><s%> vai-ye-chal-Kem divided דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David מַחְלְק֑וֹת <S%H4256><s%> mach-le-Kot; them into courses ס sa-Mek לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei among the sons לֵוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi, of Levi לְגֵרְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H1647><s%> le-ge-re-Shon Gershom קְהָ֥ת <S%H6955><s%> ke-Hat Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> u-me-ra-Ri. and Merari ס sa-Mek
לַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֖י <S%H1649><s%> lag-ge-re-shun-Ni Of the Gershonites לַעְדָּ֥ן <S%H3936><s%> la'-Dan [were] Laadan וְשִׁמְעִֽי׃ <S%H8096><s%> ve-shim-'I. and Shimei ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons לַעְדָּ֗ן <S%H3936><s%> la'-Dan, of Laadan הָרֹ֧אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh the chief יְחִיאֵ֛ל <S%H3171><s%> ye-chi-'El [was] Jehiel וְזֵתָ֥ם <S%H2241><s%> ve-ze-Tam and Zetham וְיוֹאֵ֖ל <S%H3100><s%> ve-yo-'El and Joel שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah. three ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons שִׁמְעִ֗י <S%H8096><s%> shim-'I, of Shimei; שְׁלֹמֹות she-lo-mot כשְׁלֹומִ֧ית <S%H8013><s%> she-lo-Mit Shelomith קוַחֲזִיאֵ֛ל <S%H2381><s%> va-cha-zi-'El and Haziel וְהָרָ֖ן <S%H2039><s%> ve-ha-Ran and Haran שְׁלֹשָׁ֑ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah; three אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei These [were] the chief הָאָב֖וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot of the fathers לְלַעְדָּֽן׃ <S%H3936><s%> le-la'-Dan. of Laadan ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons שִׁמְעִ֔י <S%H8096><s%> shim-'I, of Shimei יַ֣חַת <S%H3189><s%> Ya-chat [were] Jahath זִינָ֔א <S%H2126><s%> zi-Na, Zina וִיע֖וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> vi-'Ush and Jeush וּבְרִיעָ֑ה <S%H1283><s%> u-ve-ri-'Ah; and Beriah אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- [were] the sons שִׁמְעִ֖י <S%H8096><s%> shim-'I of Shimei אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah. These four

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- became יַ֣חַת <S%H3189><s%> Ya-chat And Jahath הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh, was the chief וְזִיזָ֖ה <S%H2125><s%> ve-zi-Zah and Zizah הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni; the second וִיע֤וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> vi-'Ush but Jeush וּבְרִיעָה֙ <S%H1283><s%> u-ve-ri-'Ah and Beriah לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not הִרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bu had not many בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim, sons וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu became לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit house אָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> 'Av, according to [their] father's לִפְקֻדָּ֖ה <S%H6486><s%> lif-kud-Dah reckoning אֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chat. therefore they were in one ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons קְהָ֗ת <S%H6955><s%> ke-Hat, of Kohath עַמְרָ֥ם <S%H6019><s%> 'am-Ram Amram יִצְהָ֛ר <S%H3324><s%> yitz-Har Izhar חֶבְר֥וֹן <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H5816><s%> ve-'uz-zi-'El and Uzziel אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah. four ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons עַמְרָ֖ם <S%H6019><s%> 'am-Ram of Amram אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> u-mo-Sheh; and Moses וַיִּבָּדֵ֣ל <S%H914><s%> vai-yib-ba-Del was separated אַהֲרֹ֡ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron לְֽהַקְדִּישׁוֹ֩ <S%H6942><s%> le-hak-di-Sho that he should sanctify קֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh the most קָֽדָשִׁ֤ים <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shim holy things הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- he וּבָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav he and his sons עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, ever לְהַקְטִיר֩ <S%H6999><s%> le-hak-Tir to burn incense לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לְשָׁרְת֛וֹ <S%H8334><s%> le-sha-re-To to minister וּלְבָרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> u-le-va-Rech unto him and to bless בִּשְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> bish-Mo in his name עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. ever

וּמֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> u-mo-Sheh Now [concerning] Moses אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God בָּנָ֕יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav his sons יִקָּרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> yik-ka-re-'U were named עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- among שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet of the tribe הַלֵּוִֽי׃ <S%H3878><s%> hal-le-Vi. of Levi
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, of Moses גֵּרְשֹׁ֖ם <S%H1647><s%> ge-re-Shom [were] Gershom וֶאֱלִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <S%H461><s%> ve-'e-li-'E-zer. and Eliezer
בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹם <S%H1647><s%> ge-re-Shom of Gershom שְׁבוּאֵ֥ל <S%H7619><s%> she-vu-'El Shebuel הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh. [was] the chief

וַיִּֽהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu had בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the sons אֱלִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H461><s%> 'e-li-'E-zer of Eliezer רְחַבְיָ֣ה <S%H7345><s%> re-chav-Yah [were] Rehabiah הָרֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh; the chief וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had לֶאֱלִיעֶ֙זֶר֙ <S%H461><s%> le-'e-li-'E-zer And Eliezer בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim sons אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim, had none other וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei but the sons רְחַבְיָ֖ה <S%H7345><s%> re-chav-Yah of Rehabiah רָב֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> ra-Vu many לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma-'e-lah. were very
בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Of the sons יִצְהָ֖ר <S%H3324><s%> yitz-Har of Izhar שְׁלֹמִ֥ית <S%H8019><s%> she-lo-Mit Shelomith הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh. the chief ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Of the sons חֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron; of Hebron יְרִיָּ֤הוּ <S%H3404><s%> ye-ri-Ya-hu Jeriah הָרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> ha-roSh the first אֲמַרְיָ֣ה <S%H568><s%> 'a-mar-Yah Amariah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, the second יַחֲזִיאֵל֙ <S%H3166><s%> ya-cha-zi-'El Jahaziel הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, the third וִֽיקַמְעָ֖ם <S%H3360><s%> vi-kam-'Am and Jekameam הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I. the fourth

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Of the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <S%H5816><s%> 'uz-zi-'El; of Uzziel מִיכָ֣ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah Michah הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh, the first וְיִשִּׁיָּ֖ה <S%H3449><s%> ve-yish-shi-Yah and Jesiah הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni. the second ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons מְרָרִי֙ <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <S%H4249><s%> mach-Li Mahli וּמוּשִׁ֔י <S%H4187><s%> u-mu-Shi, and Mushi בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons מַחְלִ֖י <S%H4249><s%> mach-Li of Mahli אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar וְקִֽישׁ׃ <S%H7027><s%> ve-Kish. and Kish

וַיָּ֙מָת֙ <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar, And Eleazar וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no הָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yu and had ל֛וֹ lo בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim and had no sons כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- only בָּנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> ba-Not; but daughters וַיִּשָּׂא֥וּם <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-sa-'Um took בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- the sons קִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> kish of Kish אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Hem. and their brethren

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons מוּשִׁ֗י <S%H4187><s%> mu-Shi, of Mushi מַחְלִ֥י <S%H4249><s%> mach-Li Mahli וְעֵ֛דֶר <S%H5740><s%> ve-'E-der and Eder וִירֵמ֖וֹת <S%H3406><s%> vi-re-Mot and Jeremoth שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah. three

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- These [were] the sons לֵוִי֩ <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi of Levi לְבֵ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit after the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-tei-Hem of their fathers רָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei [even] the chief הָאָב֣וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot of the fathers לִפְקוּדֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6485><s%> lif-ku-dei-Hem, as they were counted בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <S%H4557><s%> be-mis-Par by number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-mOt of names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <S%H1538><s%> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam, by their polls עֹשֵׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh that did הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah, the work לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-Dat for the service בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD מִבֶּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben from the age עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim of twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma-'e-lah. and upward
